3.Title: Hydro Tulpa
3.Desc: The gigantic combined form of many water droplets. During the challenge, small Half-Tulpas will constantly appear and fight against their opponents. The Hydro Tulpa will absorb these Half-Tulpas into itself to grow stronger. You can use <color=#f39001>attacks or Elemental Reactions</color> to disrupt this absorption process.

3.Title: Hydro Tulpa
3.Desc: The gigantic combined form of many water droplets. During the challenge, small Half-Tulpas will constantly appear and fight against their opponents. The Hydro Tulpa will absorb these Half-Tulpas into itself to grow stronger. You can use <color=#f39001>attacks or Elemental Reactions</color> to disrupt this absorption process.

6.Title: Legatus Golem
6.Desc: This ancient Legatus Golem uses its sturdy marble body to defend against attacks while using music and searing flames to obliterate its foes. Use <color=#f39001>methods suited to dealing with Geo</color> to break through its defenses. Apart from this, it will also set up resonators in combat that will assist its attacks. <color=#f39001>Destroy these resonators</color> to deplete its Ward effectively.

3.Title: Hydro Tulpa

6.Title: Legatus Golem
6.Desc: This ancient Legatus Golem uses its sturdy marble body to defend against attacks while using music and searing flames to obliterate its foes. 8.Title: Veteran Arithmetic Enhancer Mek
8.Desc: During combat, it will channel ousia energy to unleash a Gravity Reduction Field. Characters within this field can <color=#f39001>jump</color> significantly <color=#f39001>higher</color>. its core will be defended by a Geo Ward. Destroy <color=#f39001>said Ward</color> and annihilate its core using <color=#f39001>Pneuma attacks</color> to shut its Gravity Reduction Field down.

10.Title: Algorithm of Semi-Intransient Matrix of Overseer Network
10.Desc: This ancient aggregation of machinery hails from the desert and has quirks that modern-day civilizations cannot comprehend. In battle, the Algorithm of Semi-Intransient Matrix of Overseer Network will fire its components out while its core enters an "invisible" state that hides it and increases its RES. <color=#f39001>Use Catalyze reactions to strike this core, or use Electro attacks on it during such times as the fired components have been destroyed and need to recover</color> to cancel this invisibility and cause the core to be immobilized due to overclocking. If you fail to cancel the core's invisibility for too long, the Algorithm of Semi-Intransient Matrix of Overseer Network will begin to display its power by using a mighty overclocked attack...

MonsterPreviewList.Name: Algorithm of Semi-Intransient Matrix of Overseer Network
